item.title: Bringing the creed to your door!
item.author: Jason He,
item.description: Having never played the first 4⁄5 of the assassins creed series. I must say that I was first inspired to play this game from YouTube, after seeing footage of the multiplayer game. For those who don’t know, it is a game of adventure, deception and a thirst for blood and treasures. There’s two …
